mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Vangundry, Thomas J.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Poplar, Crawford Co., Ohio [Poplar, Crawford County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Vangundry, Thomas J. Patient Age: 25. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gunshot wound of right leg. Location Wounded: Near New Market. Date Wounded: 1864/05/15. Nature of Wound: Bullet. Treatment: Medical description list by J. D. Skelburg Act. Surgeon U.S.A. . Result: Returned to duty by order of hospital inspecting board.
